Okay, so does anyone know anything about these people... and how did they get my address (it's obviously computer-generated --- I don't write as spiritus saitou)?  This was in my bulk inbox this morning...
 
phil

Dear spiritus saitou ,

 

 

nFiction is the newest fanfiction site on the net and we would be proud to feature your work through our site. 

 

We have developed an easy-to-use interface so that you, the author will be spending less time uploading stories and more time receiving reviews and writing more of your fantastic work. Further more nFiction is a 100% free of charge service.
